name: GEODUELS (beta)
description:
Current Features:

  1. (NOTICE: The AI is not at a playable state, I recommend you not playing with it, as it doesn't work, i recommend getting a friend to play with you, as its much more fun! :) )
  2. Controller compatible, Keyboard and Controller should be playable. Key bindings are, Keyboard:
  3. Player 1: W, A, S, D, Left Shift.
  4. Player 2: Up arrow, Right arrow, Down arrow, Left arrow, Right Shift.
  5. Controller:
  6. Right trigger, Left trigger, Left joystick, 'A' Button.
  7. Flail body, that is physics based, and swings around!
  8. 13 skins to choose from.
  9.  A selection between 16.8 million colors for your battle ship!
  10. Beautiful Lighting and bloom effects with post processing and lost of lights!

  1.  Added slow motion effect when you destroy other player, for dramatic effect! :)
  2. Changed UI.
  3. Tron mode added! (Please note you have to restart game to switch to other game mode)
  4. Cleaned everything up
  5. New background theme!
  6.  Scoring system fixed
  7. Feed back messages on top of screen, in-case your wondering who scored the point!
  8. Fixed a couple of bugs relating to the camera!
  9. Optimized game code!
